description: The Consultative Working Group for South Kensington meets regularly. We publish the minutes and presentations from those meetings

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["A working group of interested local residents groups, cultural organisations and the Royal Borough of Kensington \u0026 Chelsea - the Consultative Working Group (CWG) - helped us develop our proposals for development in and around South Kensington station."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Over the last few years we have worked with local stakeholders on a development brief. This helped establish principles for any future development around the station.

The brief reflects our ambition for a respectful, high-quality development at South Kensington. Native Land used it as inspiration for their proposals, and suggested other areas which could be improved.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Original development brief for development around South Kensington station","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/sks-development-brief-december-2016.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 46.30MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Between March 2016 and September 2017 we ran a series of events to give as many people as possible an opportunity to comment on and help shape our proposals.
